metadata.title: CVE-2021-23566 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: The package nanoid from 3.0.0 and before 3.1.31 are vulnerable to Information Exposure via the valueOf() function which allows to reproduce the last id generated.

notes.note: amurray> The Debian chromium source package is called chromium-browser in Ubuntu mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 19.10, the chromium-browser package is just a script that installs the Chromium snap no indication chromium-browser is vulnerable to this issue

criterions.comment: node-mocha package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
node-postcss package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
